name: Greymon_X
description: Greymon X is a Dinosaur Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody . The most outstanding among Dinosaur Digimon as a Combat Species , Greymon became even more aggressive. Although it has a relatively small build among Dinosaur-types, many of which are large Digimon, it has fully exhibited its carnivorous dinosaur-like ferocity, winning in battles and increasing its own strength. By enhancing "Nova Blast" to its utmost limit in its mouth, it acquired its "Mega Burst", which possesses explosive power.
